posts.post_title: FS (Price reduced) - T205 Joe Tinker Piedmont - SGC 4
posts.post_content: For Sale (Price reduced) - T205 Joe Tinker Piedmont - SGC 4  $410 venmo no fee or $425 pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.
